spatial_accuracy.notes: The 3D render does not match the 2D plan’s room layout (Activity + Balcony + Beds 2/3/4 + Bath + WC + Linen + Robes + stair recess). Overall room placement, wall layout, and circulation differ entirely. Door and window locations/orientations shown in 3D do not correspond to the plan. Room proportions from the labeled dimensions in the plan are not preserved.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major structural mismatch: most plan rooms are absent and several new spaces appear. Adjacency relationships (e.g., bath/WC cluster near Bed 4, corridor serving bedrooms, balcony off Activity) are not represented. Wall topology and thickness logic do not follow the plan; the 3D model effectively depicts a different unit/level.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture in 3D (sofas, dining table, kitchen island/benches) does not correspond to the plan’s bedroom and activity/balcony furnishing indications. Bed layouts for Beds 2/3/4 are not represented; scale cannot be verified against the plan due to mismatched program.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with coherent materials and lighting. Camera is broadly isometric-like, though not strictly orthographic. Geometry is mostly clean, but architectural fidelity to the provided plan is poor (evaluated separately in other sections).

detected_errors.description: Missing Activity room as defined in plan (large upper-left space with stair recess connection).
Missing Balcony (plan shows balcony off Activity with balustrade and tiled area).
Missing Bed 2 room (plan bottom-center/left bedroom with window and door from hall).
Missing Bed 3 room (plan bottom-right bedroom with robe).
Missing Bed 4 room (plan top-right bedroom with robe and adjacency to WC/Bath zone).
Missing separate Bath and separate WC rooms (plan has two distinct wet areas).
Missing Linen closet shown between hall and Bed 2 in plan.
Missing Robe/wardrobe elements for Beds 3 and 4 as drawn in plan.
Missing stair/recess area and indicated stair direction/landing geometry present in plan.
Hallucinated garage/car space on the right side of the 3D render (not present in the 2D plan).
Hallucinated open-plan living/dining/kitchen arrangement (sofas, dining table, kitchen island) which is not part of the provided floor plan.
Windows are placed on different walls and in different counts/configurations than the plan (plan has specific bedroom/activity/balcony openings; 3D shows large glazing inconsistent with these).
Door placements and swings do not match the plan’s corridor/bedroom/bath/WC door locations; 3D shows different internal partitioning and entry points.
Overall building footprint and room proportions do not align with the plan’s labeled dimensions and stepped perimeter; 3D massing represents a different outline.
